definitions.definition: A morpheme inserted inside an existing word, such as -bloody- in English.
A morpheme that always appears between other morphemes in a word, such as -i- and -o- in English.
To set; to fasten or fix by piercing or thrusting in.
definitions.example: to infix a sting, spear, or dart

definitions.definition: To insert a morpheme inside an existing word.
